title: Weather Dashboard
description: A simple weather app with a responsive background approximating the user's current conditions, current weather conditions, and a 5 day forecast.

title: Cheap Cheap
description: A simple local electronics product finder built with a team using Javascript ES6 and leveraging the Google Maps and the Best Buy APIs.

title: Docket Master
description: A full-stack web-deployed application. This app was built with a team using MySQL and Sequelize and provides users with a fully-functioning court docketing system.
